questions.question: Confirm the Equipment with below provided image.
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again.
confirm is there any physical Damage of the Equipment.
prepare the Incident / Damage and Missing Report.
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON.
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC voltage of 230
shift the Equipment to another place where the AC voltage of 230 is provided.
check the power cord continuity as shown in the video and confirm whether the power cord is defective.
then replace the power cord with the new one
check and confirm for any cracks / Breakage in the Input power pin connector.
replace the input power pin connector with a new one
open the equipment as shown in the video and replace / repair the SMPS with a new one
check and confirm whether any message as port 1 and port 2 probes are not connected appears on the screen / Display.
check and confirm whether probes are connected properly.
reconnect the probes properly
switch off the unit, connect the probes and turn ON the machine and confirm whether the message still appears.
open the equipment as shown in the video and replace the Cable Module with a new one
check and confirm whether the cursor appears on the screen but there is no movement of cursor on the screen.
open the cursor ball lock, remove the ball clean the sensor control area and replace it back
Check and confirm whether the display appears blank / plain.
turn off the machine and turn it ON again. Confirm whether the issue still occurs.
open the equipment as shown in the video, clean the RAM’s on the mother board with cleaner solution, wait for a while, reseat the RAM’s back. Check and confirm whether the issue persists.
replace the RAM’s with a new one. Check and confirm whether issue still persists.
replace VGA Card with a new one
check and confirm whether the image doesn’t appear on the display during scanning.
open the equipment as shown in the video. Replace the TR board with a new one
check and confirm whether the screen / Display appears blank with blue screen.
replace the hard disk with a new one
If the problem is not yet solved, contact the Technical Team for any other assistance through video call.
Thanks
